what-bec.title: What is the BEC?
what-bec.text1: It`s a competition that provides a platform for young engineers to apply their knowledge and abilities in addressing real technical issues within the Case Study (CS) or Team Design (TD) categories.
what-bec.text2: Participants are students passionate about tackling contemporary challenges and developing innovative projects. The main goal of the event is to spark interest among youth in the advancement of engineering, raise a level of awareness of the field and foster the availability of skilled professionals in Ukraine.

subjects.text: — a category in which you need to propose a theoretical solution to a given engineering, economic, production, social, or marketing issue.
— to develop a plan of action that covers all the requirements and fits within a certain budget.
— a category in which participants are required to solve a practical issue in the field of IoT, embedded, electronics, radio engineering, or mechanics.
— to create a new device prototype or improve an old one using the materials provided.

about-best.title: About BEST Lviv
about-best.text: BEST Lviv (Board of European Students of Technology) is a chapter of an international non-profit public organization that brings together students of technical specialties. Our mission is to develop students through knowledge exchange and cooperation between companies, universities and students in Europe.

basket.title: Cart
basket.successMessage: The purchase letter has been successfully sent to the organizers, expect a reply!
basket.modalError3: Please enter a valid email address
basket.discontText1: on purchase three packages of proposals
basket.discontText2: for partner companies of EBEC`2021 and/or BEC`2023 (applies after the agreement of the organisers)
basket.discontText3: for each partner, that works in military and military-tech field of work (applies after the agreement of the organisers)

packets.title: Packages of proposals
packets.discontText1: *10% of all funds will be transferred to support our army.
packets.discontText2: *The payment will proceed according to the NBU exchange rate.
packets.discontText3: *After the end of the competition each partner company will get a full report with all the photos and aftermovie.

propositions.title: Solid Base
points: Option of providing a judge or/and a mentor
The logotype on our website, on the brand wall and in the aftermovie
propositions.subInfo: This package of proposals is mandatory!

propositions.title: Utopia
points: Possibility to conduct a workshop among participants
Access to the CV database of participants
Sending out job vacancies via a Telegram bot
Article about the company on the event website

propositions.title: Advanced
points: Sending out job vacancies via a Telegram bot
propositions.subInfo: The company can choose 4 selling points out of 7

propositions.title: Solid Base

points.description: Information about your company will be posted on our social media: 1 Instagram story on the official page @best_lviv and 1 LinkedIn post about our organisation.

The networking is an informal meeting of the company's representatives, participants, and organisers. The company can tell students about itself, current vacancies, and internship possibilities. The networking will be held on the day of the competition's official closing.

points.text: Option of providing a judge or/and a mentor
points.description: The company provides a mentor and/or a judge for the category Case Study/Team Design. Mentoring sessions will be held during the competitions, so participants will have a chance to consult with your company's qualified employees.
Your company's logotype will be placed on the competition's official website.
During the competitions, a giant banner with the logotypes of all the partners will be installed in the venue.
Your company's logo will be shown in the after-movie of the competitions, which will be posted on the Instagram page @best_lviv.

propositions.subInfo: This package of proposals is mandatory!

propositions.title: Influencer

points.description: Information about your company will be posted on our Instagram page @best_lviv.
Information about your company will be posted in the joint post on our Telegram channel BEST Lviv Students.
Your company's banner will be installed in the venue during the competitions. The company provides a banner and a stand for it.
At the beginning of the networking, you can present your company via video. The video should last no longer than 5 minutes.

propositions.subInfo: Limited offer: only three companies can buy.

propositions.title: Advanced

points.description: Unique video on the Instagram page @best_lviv about your company.

During networking, participants of the competition will have a chance to engage in a short interview with representatives from your company. This is an opportunity to discover new talents and prospective employees within the student community.
The opportunity to present your company to the participants before the networking in the form of a video that will last up to 5 minutes.
You will be able to choose your own nomination in the competition and reward the team whose solution or performance resonates most with your company.
After the event, our Instagram stories will be filled with your company's content. You can send your videos or our team will help you create them. There will be up to 5 such stories.

points.text: Sending out job vacancies via a Telegram bot
points.description: Semi-annual mailing of company vacancies in our Telegram bot, intended for registration, important announcements and communication during the event.

This is an opportunity to make a podcast with our team and share your professional opinion on current issues in the field of engineering and beyond. The full video will be posted on our YouTube channel BEST Lviv, and some highlights on our Instagram page @best_lviv.

propositions.subInfo: The company can choose 4 selling points out of 7.

points.text: Possibility to conduct a workshop among participants
points.description: Opportunity to conduct a workshop or training lasting up to 40 minutes for participants during the official opening of the competition.
Your company's logo will be printed on the T-shirts that will be given to the participants and representatives of the BEST Lviv organisation.

points.text: Access to the CV database of participants
points.description: This is an opportunity to access the CV database of participants.
Representatives of your company will have unrestricted access to the competition venue.

points.text: Sending out job vacancies via a Telegram bot
points.description: Semi-annual mailing of company vacancies in our Telegram bot, intended for registration, important announcements and communication during the event.

points.text: Article about the company on the event website
points.description: We will publish an article about your company and its contribution to the organisation of the event on the official website of the competition.

propositions.text: Sending out job vacancies via a Telegram bot

opportunities.title: FOR COMPANY THE BEC — AN OPPORTUNITY TO

opportunities.text: Increase the recognition of your company among the student community
Encourage active young people of Ukraine interested in engineering to cooperate
Find new ideas to solve your problem
Meet talented students and select promising employees among them
Support the development of young engineers
